content: दृष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [दृश्-कर्भणि-क्त] {@--1@} Seen, looked, perceived, observed, beheld. {@--2@} Visible, observable. {@--3@} Regarded, considered. {@--4@} Occurring, found. {@--5@} Appearing, manifested. {@--6@} Known, learned, understood. {@--7@} Determined, decided, fixed. {@--8@} Valid. {@--9@} Allotted. {@--10@} Experienced, suffered, endured, felt. {@--11@} Treated of. See दृश्. --ष्टं {@--1@} Perception, observation. {@--2@} Danger from dacoits.
